institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 35 (Change in business plan of autonomous joint training center, etc.)
contents: Article 35 (Change in business plan of autonomous joint training center, etc.) Notwithstanding Articles 32 through 34, autonomous joint training center changes its business plan through prior deliberation and resolution by the operating committee (Regulations Articles 19 and 20) In this case (limited to cases where there is no increase in the support fund pursuant to Article 14), if matters related to changes are submitted to the Corporation before the submission of the business plan for the following year in accordance with Article 14 (4) of the Regulations, the procedures for changes are deemed to have been complied with.
